data.title: Columbus State Community College
data.meta_description: A community college in Columbus, Ohio. You can earn a two-year technical degree, or complete the first two years of your bachelor's degree. We also offer noncredit training, ESL, GED and other services. With an open enrollment policy and the lowest tuition cost in the area, Columbus State is where the world is going.
